DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 3 Bolus Preparation or Mastication Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of bolus preparation/mastication in the oral impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Oral Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Bolus Preparation or Mastication
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's bolus preparation and/or mastication prior to swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Oral Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Bolus Preparation or Mastication
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's bolus preparation and/or mastication prior to swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Impairment of Bolus Preparation or Mastication
Concepts.definition: An observation of an individual's bolus preparation and/or mastication prior to swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Minimal chewing/mashing with majority of bolus unchewed

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Minimal chewing/mashing with majority of bolus unchewed
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of minimal chewing or mashing with majority of bolus unchewed prior to swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Minimal Chewing or Mashing with Majority of Bolus Unchewed
Concepts.definition: A finding of minimal chewing or mashing with majority of bolus unchewed prior to swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Disorganized chewing/mashing with solid pieces of bolus unchewed

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Disorganized chewing/mashing with solid pieces of bolus unchewed
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of disorganized chewing or mashing with solid pieces of bolus unchewed prior to swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Disorganized Chewing or Mashing with Solid Pieces of Bolus Unchewed
Concepts.definition: A finding of disorganized chewing or mashing with solid pieces of bolus unchewed prior to swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Slow prolonged chewing/mashing with complete re-collection

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Slow prolonged chewing/mashing with complete re-collection
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of slow prolonged chewing or mashing with complete re-collection prior to swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Slow Prolonged Chewing or Mashing with Complete Re-Collection
Concepts.definition: A finding of slow prolonged chewing or mashing with complete re-collection prior to swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Timely and Efficient Chewing and Mashing

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Timely and Efficient Chewing and Mashing
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of timely and efficient chewing and mashing prior to swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Timely and Efficient Chewing and Mashing
Concepts.definition: A finding of timely and efficient chewing and mashing prior to swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16
